extendedInfo.description: âChosen as Google Play's Featured RPG Game!âAre you ready to become a hero?Enter 'The World of Magic', one of the first MMORPGs for mobile!In an ancient world, two forces are in conflict: the Siras Empire, led by young and ambitious Emperor Kanos, and the Kingdom of Lanos, ruled by King Roberto. Join a side and explore, complete quests, and fight your way to the top!Pick and choose to be whoever you want: a brave ranger, whimsical magician or a fearsome warrior! And thatâs not all: Own your very own pet to aid you in your quests!More than one million players are already online! reviews.title: Great and cute RPG!
reviews.comment: Great and fun to play, please add more stuff in updates like a set of magician, archer, and warrior stuff.
reviews.author: Julie Anne

reviews.title: Some of my opinions......
reviews.comment: You should make a tab in thea menu for music on our phones. Also you should make notifications  for the last profile signed in, like if their items were sold it would notify them. And it would be nice of i had some nice drop rates, it seems i never get good drops. It would also be cool if we could change the skin color of the people; im mixed and i want a mixed person, there should be like 5 different skin tones.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs one thing
reviews.comment: Perfect but can you guys add multiwindow support for galaxy s3 and note 2? They give the instructions on how to add it. :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great game, but
reviews.comment: I paid for 10packs of 99doller platinum, but i havent gotten it yet. Is this a problem you can fix? Because i would hate lose my money. I have tried reinstalling but that made the situation worse. Any ways to get my money back or get platinum?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The best game I ever played in mobile!
reviews.comment: but it should be better if the game has a story quests so we will fully understand the story of siras and lanos.  Make a filipino Server XD hahaha
reviews.author: David Toribio

reviews.title: How to take off security?
reviews.comment: Umm, I gave u 5 stars bcuz I ULTIMATELY LOVE THIS GAME! And... I have a question... How do u take off security??? @-@ I`m so curious. ^^
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Waiting for my money
reviews.comment: Seeing as how you never spoke about banning root users before and allowed them to purchase platinum,when can we exspect to get are money back? I dont belive its right to take peoples money then later tell them they cant play. So was just wondering when can we exspect refunds to come?
reviews.author: Wheresmy Money

reviews.title: Update tips
reviews.comment: Hello Developers i love this game so much it\'s a great app my family also love it. I been a member of com2us for about 3 years and 5 stars isn\'t enough. Here is my wish list #1. Maps for the light house its kinda hard without maps that pin objectives. #2. Drop rate of items from bosses need a boost waiting for hours with no drop is kinda hard. #3. Hair styles longer cooler hair styles. Tysm for this app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Unsure
reviews.comment: Unsure weather i wanna continue due to the fact i have 500+ dollars put into this game it constenty lags the exp system is low the maps r now to small still in debate weather or not i will continue
reviews.author: John Steffen

reviews.title: Awesome but
reviews.comment: Ever since new update once i click my profile person it closes...cant play the game now...im on galaxy tablet 10.1..plz fix im uninstalling it amd see if it fixes if i re do it

reviews.title: Amazing! :D
reviews.comment: really cute and very addicting. please fix the issue about the auto-log in on ipods because I always have to sign in over and over just so I can play. otherwise, great game!

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: This game is so much fun! A game of this quality on the phone for free is truly hard to find!  However, the app doesn\'t start half the time I try to start up the game. Please fix!

reviews.title: need some fix
reviews.comment: when i got the new update, it kinda keeps logging me off some times later and if this is fixed, ill re-rate it 5 stars but overall it still is a good game. and u should have 1 week event were monsters drop rates increase like the rare items for boss, instead of rarely, make it to so that the drops are often likely to drop.
